MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As Integer
public: property int Column { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.

span.span: Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.

value.span: 以零為起始的序號，識別資料行，內含格或項目。

span.span: A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the column containing the cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，接聽程式會宣告為追蹤方格項目位於方格容器內的往返。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. 項目屬性會在每個焦點變更事件時，主控台回應。Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainingGrid As AutomationElement

summary.span: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports and represents the container of the cell or item.

span.span: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports and represents the container of the cell or item.

value.span: A[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目支援 GridPattern 並代表資料表資料格或項目容器。

span.span: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports the GridPattern and represents the table cell or item container.

value.span: 預設值是 null 參考 (在 Microsoft Visual Basic.NET)。

span.span: The default is a null reference ( in Microsoft Visual Basic .NET).
